Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.28178190] Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC=64 μM), Streptococcus Faecalis ATCC 29212 (MIC=32 μM), Bacillus subtilis CMCC 63501 (MIC=16 μM), Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228 (MIC=32 μM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=16 μM), Escherichia coli UB 1005 (MIC=32 μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC=16 μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1 (MIC=32 μM), Salmonella typhimurium ATCC 14028 (MIC=16 μM), Salmonella typhimurium ATCC 7731 (MIC=32 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.28178190] 3% hemolysis at 128 μM against human red cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria

Literature.Title: High Specific Selectivity and Membrane-Active Mechanism of Synthetic Cationic Hybrid Antimicrobial Peptides Based on the Peptide FV7
Literature.Author: Tan T, Wu D, Li W, Zheng X, Li W, Shan A.
